title: Citi Retail Services Named a Finalist in 2016 BAI Global Innovation Awards
summary: Atlanta - Citi Retail Services, one of North America's largest and most experienced retail credit solutions providers, has been named a finalist for the BAI Global Innovation Awards in the Innovation in Internal Process Improvement award category.
tag-1: Citi Retail Services Named a Finalist in 2016 BAI Global Innovation Awards
tag-3: Atlanta – Citi Retail Services, one of North America's largest and most experienced retail credit solutions providers, has been named a finalist for the BAI Global Innovation Awards in the Innovation in Internal Process Improvement award category.
tag-4: Citi Retail Services is being recognized for its Entity Linkage Framework (ELF) initiative, an industry-leading technological innovation that provides a comprehensive, unified view of data that can serve to mitigate fraud or credit abuse, enhance customer experiences, and improve operating efficiency.
tag-5: "Citi Retail Services remains committed to innovating across every aspect of our business and ELF is a strong example of that dedication," said Leslie McNamara, Managing Director, Business & Market Development at Citi Retail Services. "We are proud to receive another accolade for this innovative technology, which is a major leap forward in our risk management capabilities, and look forward to continually enabling industry-leading solutions and support for all of our partners."
tag-6: The BAI Global Banking Innovation Awards are a catalyst for innovation in the financial sector, with Citi's ELF representing one of 15 finalists for the awards. Additional information on the awards can be found at BAIGlobalInnovations.com. Winners will be announced at the BAI Beacon conference in Chicago on October 5-6, 2016.
tag-7: Citi Retail Services delivers consumer and commercial credit card products, both private label and co-brand, to retailers and their clients across North America. Backed by the global power of Citi, the business serves nearly 90 million accounts for a number of iconic brands, including Best Buy, ExxonMobil, Macy's, Sears, Shell and The Home Depot. Citi Retail Services offers cutting-edge digital options, multi-channel retailing expertise and industry-leading data analytics capabilities that help retailers from a broad range of industries grow their businesses.
tag-8: Citi Citi, the leading global bank, has approximately 200 million customer accounts and does business in more than 160 countries and jurisdictions. Citi provides consumers, corporations, governments and institutions with a broad range of financial products and services, including consumer banking and credit, corporate and investment banking, securities brokerage, transaction services, and wealth management.
